info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:52PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS... NORTHEASTERN ST. CHARLES AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI... At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Alton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alton, Godfrey, Bethalto, East Alton, West Alton, Portage Des Sioux, and Rosewood Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
